title: An Act relative to semiautomatic rifles and shotguns

abstracts.abstract: By Representatives Sweezey of Duxbury and Frost of Auburn, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2711) of Kenneth P. Sweezey and Paul K. Frost relative to semiautomatic rifles and shotguns.  Public Safety and Homeland Security.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security

related_entities.name: committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security
